contentrichtext.text: {{Notability|Organizations|date=June 2011}} {{refimprove|date=June 2011}} {{Infobox Political Youth Organization |name_english = Aldwych Group |logo = [[Image:AldwychGroup.PNG]] |colorcode = Blue |foundation = 1994 |chairperson = [[Sean Ruston]] |vice-chairperson = [[Mark Sewards]] |secretary = [[Simisola Smith]] |headquarters = |international = |website = [http://www.aldwychgroup.org/ www.aldwychgroup.org] }} The '''Aldwych Group''' is the group of [[students' union]]s of the members of the [[Russell Group|Russell Group of Universities]] in the United Kingdom. It was established in 1994, by Money Saving Expert [[Martin Lewis (financial journalist)|Martin Lewis]] (who was General Secretary of [[London School of Economics Union|LSE Union]] in 1994/5) as a watchdog in response to the creation of the Russell Group.<ref>[http://www.guardian.co.uk/education/2006/jan/20/students.uk Student group threatens to boycott national survey], Guardian, 20 January 2006</ref><ref>[http://www.independent.co.uk/news/education/education-news/universities-slam-willetts-cutprice-degrees-scheme-2283228.html Universities slam Willetts' 'cut-price' degrees scheme], Independent, 13 May 2011</ref><ref>http://www.guardian.co.uk/education/2000/dec/04/highereducation.researchassessmentexercise1</ref> It is so called because its was established at a meeting at the [[London School of Economics and Political Science]], which is located on [[Aldwych]]. The current Chair is Laura Perry of Newcastle University Students' Union, who was elected in July 2012. == Members == The Student's Unions of each of: * [[University of Birmingham Guild of unions (KCLSU, QMSU, LSESU and UCL Union) being members * The [[National Union of Students (United Kingdom)|National Union of Students]] * The [[National Postgraduate Committee]], due to the high
